segments.text: My disposable contact lenses . They're great for camping !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cool ! Each contact comes in its own saline solution ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yep . They're prescription contacts with UV protection .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow ! How high-class ... a new pair for each day ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You just pop'em in in the morning , take them out at night , and then throw them away . No cleaning !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cool . So are you near-sighted or far-sighted ?
segments.speaker: S2
